attributeCategories.name: material
attributeCategories.description: Colors and patterns may vary from representation.

attributeCategories.name: Endleaf Style
attributeCategories.description: Endleaves are the protective paper that separate the inside spreads from the cover.

attributeCategories.name: Insert Boards
attributeCategories.description: Add rigidity with thicker spreads for a more traditional album quality.

attributes.name: photo lustre
attributes.description: A true photographic lustre paper, ideal for skin tones.

attributes.name: premium lustre
attributes.description: Our highest quality album paper producing vibrant colors with a slight sheen. Inkjet printed.

attributes.name: smooth matte
attributes.description: A soft, uncoated paper with great color accuracy.

attributes.name: photo deep matte
attributes.description: Non-reflective matte photo paper great for skin tones, soft images and black + whites.

attributeCategories.name: Sample Product
attributeCategories.description: Sample products include a "Sample, Not for Resale" silver foil stamp on both the inside front cover and inside back cover.

attributeCategories.name: spine material
attributeCategories.description: Colors and patterns may vary from representation.

attributes.name: One Day Shipping, Standard - USA only (Includes Peak Surcharge)
One Day Shipping, Priority - USA only (Includes Peak Surcharge)
USA Drop Ship – Lowest Cost (Includes Peak Surcharge)
USA Drop Ship – One-Day Shipping, Priority (Includes Peak Surcharge)
Canada Drop Ship – UPS Standard (Includes Peak Surcharge)
International Drop Ship – USPS Priority Mail (Includes Peak Surcharge)

productRules.description: Cameos are not allowed on 6x6 size
Debossing is not allowed on either cover if both are combo covers
Debossing or custom die are not allowed on the front if the front is a combo cover
Disable the combo_cover category UNLESS cover_combo is chosen as the cover type
When non-combo covers are chosen, make cover_material required
When combo covers are chosen, make combo subcategories required, disable cameos
Blind debossing is not allowed with Quicksand font (front)
Blind debossing is not allowed with Quicksand font (back)
Foil debossing colors are not allowed with Oswald font (front)
Foil debossing colors are not allowed with Oswald font (back)
Make all debossing subcategories required when debossing is enabled (front)
Make all debossing subcategories required when debossing is enabled (back)
Make all die subcategories required when custom die is enabled (front)
Make all die subcategories required when custom die is enabled (back)
Debossing is not allowed on padded covers
Oswald debossing font is not allowed on silk or fabric materials
Oswald debossing font is not allowed on silk or fabric spine materials
Oswald debossing font and most debossing colors are not allowed on the very dark premium leather materials
Oswald debossing font and most debossing colors are not allowed on the very dark premium leather spine materials
Oswald debossing font and most debossing colors (including blind) are not allowed on the lighter-shade premium leather materials
Oswald debossing font and most debossing colors (including blind) are not allowed on the lighter-shade premium leather spine materials
No debossing is allowed on linen, floral fabric, or black alligator leather materials
No debossing is allowed on linen, floral fabric, or black alligator leather spine materials
Front custom die is not allowed when front cover debossing is selected.
Back custom die is not allowed when back cover debossing is selected.
Front text debossing is not allowed when a front custom die is selected.
Back text debossing is not allowed when a front custom die is selected.
